subject: Football
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. owners on Wednesday tabled a proposal to move the overtime kickoff to the 35-yard line from the 30 to offset the advantage a team receives by winning the overtime coin toss.
snippet: N.F.L. owners on Wednesday tabled a proposal to move the overtime kickoff to the 35-yard line from the 30 to offset the advantage a team receives by winning the overtime coin toss.
